WorkItem.ClosedComment: DoneI created an object named "jHtmlAreaColorPickerMenu" that resides within the "jHtmlAreaColorPickerMenu.js" file. This file includes a somewhat generic color picker menu that can be used for any purpose, plus it includes the code to wire up and override the "stock" jHtmlColor.forecolor functionality and inject the new Color Picker Menu functionality in it's place when you click on the "forecolor" toolbar button.
WorkItem.Description: To keep the editor as light weight as possible, I don't want to create/add a Color Picker for use with the "forecolor" method. Instead the Color Picker will be created as an plugin/extension to the jHtmlArea object using it's nice extensibility model.

Comments.Message: Changed the name of the js file to "jHtmlArea.ColorPickerMenu-0.6.0.js", but the name of the object will remain as "jHtmlAreaColorPickerMenu" for now.
